Critical Notes: Reported as Reniera sp.nov. "Adocia originally included Haplosclerida with Haliclona skeletal structure and a distinct ectosome. The genus was synonymized with Haliclona subgenus Haliclona by de Weerdt, W.H. (2002) in Systema Porifera" (Bruce Ott pers. comm., 2021).

Author: (Lambe, 1893)
Notes: reported as Amphilectus rigida (GBIF); as Neoesperiopsis rigida (RBCM)
